meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a hemisphere.
meanings.sent1: The map displayed the hemispheric division of the Earth.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the hemispheric patterns of brain activity.
meanings.sent3: The hemispheric weather forecast predicted sunny skies in the north and rainy days in the south.
meanings.sent4: Her hemispheric thinking allowed her to see both sides of the argument clearly.
meanings.sent5: The hemispheric view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Divided into or located in hemispheres.
meanings.sent1: The hemispheric design of the building featured two distinct sections.
meanings.sent2: The hemispheric structure of the brain enables different functions in each half.
meanings.sent3: The hemispheric cake was decorated with half chocolate and half vanilla frosting.
meanings.sent4: The hemispheric layout of the garden created a sense of balance and harmony.
meanings.sent5: The hemispheric distribution of resources ensured equal access for all regions.
